name: Portcullis
description:
Your home town has been taken over by an evil sorcerer (because that's what evil sorcerers do.) A party of professional adventurers has arrived in town to dethrone him (because that's what adventurers do.) Help them defeat Zapdorf and liberate the town – or is there something else going on?

A comic fantasy storygame in the style of early Infocom gamesx, written for the 35th anniversary of Zork and the 40th anniversary of the original Adventure.
